body.name: Novilla King Mattress, 10 Inch Memory Foam Mattress King Size with Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam for Pressure Relief & Fresh Cool Sleep,Removable Washable Mattress Cover,King Memory Foam Mattress
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 21 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: CertiPUR-US CERTIFIED ENSURES HEALTHY SLEEP - The Novilla king mattress is designed with a 2-layer foam system for better support and comfort. The mattress layers consist of 2" Charcoal-Infused Memory Foam and 8" High-Density Charcoal Support Base Foam. The charcoal-infused memory foam adsorbs moisture and helps keep the sleep surface cool, providing you with a fresh and clean sleeping environment.

COOL & COMFORTABLE SLEEP - The queen memory foam mattress cover is made of high-quality knitted fabrics, providing superior comfort and durability. Knitted fabrics excel in great breathability and are soft-to-touch with enhanced air circulation for a cooler night's sleep. Sleepers who typically overheat while sleeping will benefit most from this mattress.

PRESSURE RELIEF & EDGE SUPPORT - The memory foam mattress king offers a firmness sleep experience. Underneath the mattress cover lies a layer of charcoal-infused memory foam that conforms closely to the body's shape and relieves pain at pressure points. The supportive base generates enough pushback to provide excellent support to the body. The edge support on both sides of the mattress is reinforced to prevent slipping when sitting or sleeping near the edge.

REMOVABLE WASHABLE MATTRESS COVER - Equipped with a high-quality zipper at the bottom of the mattress for easy removal of the cover. You can simply toss it into the washing machine for a quick and easy clean, protecting your mattress from stains and keeping the sleeping surface hygienic.

WORRY-FREE PURCHASE - The king mattresses come with a no-risk 100-night trial and a 10-year limited warranty. The mattress king is compressed, rolled, and shipped in a box, making it convenient for you to set up by yourself. It's compatible with most bed bases and frames. For a better sleeping experience, please allow at least 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand. Please feel free to contact Novilla Customer Support Team if you experience any issues or are not satisfied with the product.
body.description: Many people look forward to sinking into bed and relaxing at the end of a long day. A comfortable mattress will allow you to get a good night's rest and wake up refreshed the next day. The Novilla mattress provides superior support and comfort for your sleep. With bamboo charcoal memory foam on the top, this mattress adapts to your body, relieving pressure on sensitive areas and regulating temperature. Plus, it eliminates odors and prevents allergies, so you can rest easy knowing you're sleeping on a hygienic surface. Whether you're looking for a mattress for your master or guest bedroom, bunk beds for children, rental properties, or dormitories, the Novilla mattress is suitable for all sleep needs. It's perfect for most back sleepers, most stomach sleepers, and even some side sleepers. And with its easy installation process, simply bring it to your room, remove the packaging, and let it expand to its original shape within 72 hours.What's in the Box?1 x Novilla Memory Foam Mattress1 x Novilla Manual1 x Warranty Card1 x Package OpenerNote：1. When unpacking, be careful with bumps and bruises.2. Please be patient as it takes at least 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand.3. This Novilla mattress offers a firmer sleep experience, so please choose carefully when making your purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am delighted with my purchase of this full-size mattress from Amazon! It has exceeded all my expectations, providing an unparalleled level of comfort and support. The mattress strikes the perfect balance between plushness and firmness, ensuring a peaceful and rejuvenating sleep every night.What truly sets this mattress apart is its innovative design, specifically crafted to alleviate pressure points and cater to different sleeping preferences. I wake up feeling refreshed and without any discomfort, a testament to the mattress's ability to promote a healthy sleep environment.The breathability of the mattress is impressive, keeping me cool and ensuring a comfortable temperature throughout the night. Unpacking was a breeze, and the mattress quickly expanded to its full size without any lingering odors.In terms of durability, this mattress has proven to be a long-lasting and worthwhile investment. This full-size mattress is high quality, comfortable, and a great night's sleep – it's a definite good product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Clean, refreshing and very atmospheric. A very cost-effective mattress, and the fabric is skin-friendly. Once spread, there is no need to spread other mattresses or cushions. One piece is ready, you can just lay a mat on it and sleep on it. There is no peculiar smell. The packaging from the store is also very good. It is spotless and clean and tidy. There is no color difference. You can lay it down as soon as you receive it.the outer cover can be removable and it clean easily!This one is very suitable for me. , I like it so much, and my family also likes it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the this 12 Inch Queen Size Memory Foam Mattress, and it has made a noticeable difference in my sleep quality. The firmness level strikes a good balance, providing ample support without sacrificing comfort.One standout feature is the incorporation of bamboo charcoal memory foam. This element seems to enhance pressure relief, and I've experienced reduced stiffness upon waking. The mattress also manages heat well, creating a sleep environment that feels fresh and cool throughout the night.Craftsmanship appears solid, with no evident issues such as sagging or irregularities. It gives the impression of a well-made product designed to last.In summary, this mattress offers a promising combination of support, pressure relief, and temperature regulation. While my experience has generally been positive, individual preferences may vary, and it's essential to consider personal comfort preferences as its firm mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have been struggling to purchase a mattress for my son to sleep alone for months already. This mattress is a right fit for him. It is my first time getting a mattress without springs. I was worried that if it would be too soft when I ordered it. It is actually very comfortable. I tried to sleep on it for a night and It’s just right. I don’t feel any back pain. My son loves it too. It is quite worthy of the price. The mattress is bought in a compressed package and it’s easy and light to carry upstairs. After unpacking it the 2nd day, it expands completely. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my baby girl as a floor bed.The shipping is fast and secure. It is compressed tightly in the box. Kinda heavy and long for a short girl tho.The mattress is not fully extended when I took the picture, but I’m very satisfied with the quality. I’m looking for a mattress soft and firm, and this one meets my expectations. It comes with a protector. And it’s not expensive for a good mattress! My girl can use it till puberty!Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable mattress with careful delivery
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a Full size mattress, specifically the 10 Inch Memory Foam Mattress with Bamboo Charcoal. I have been absolutely delighted with my purchase. The mattress is extremely comfortable and provides excellent pressure relief. The memory foam contours to my body, ensuring a restful and rejuvenating sleep experience.One of the standout features of this mattress is the Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam. Not only does it provide added support, but it also boasts natural odor-absorbing properties, keeping the mattress fresh and clean. I appreciate knowing that I am sleeping on a mattress that promotes a healthy sleeping environment.The removable and washable mattress cover is another great feature. It is convenient and easy to clean, ensuring that my mattress stays in top-notch condition for years to come. Plus, the fact that it is removable adds an extra layer of reassurance when it comes to maintaining hygiene and cleanliness.I would also like to mention the exceptional delivery service. My mattress was delivered promptly and with great care by the UPS guy. The packaging was robust, ensuring that the mattress arrived in perfect condition, free from any damage during transit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got it for a parent she likes it a lot very satisfied with it. Very comfortable and works well with her adjustable bed frame. Will be ordering another for my guess room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable mattress. Very recommend!
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this mattress and it has truly transformed my sleeping experience. My old mattress always caused back pain and neck stress so I decided to have a new one. After comparison, I chose this one and it proves that I made the right decision. The package is well designed that one person can easily move it and open it. The mattress is soft and very comfortable. It has just the right support and will not lead to back pain. I am a very easily back pain person and after several nights of sleep, I did not have back pain at all. So I would say the firmness is very well designed. At the same time, the mattress does not have a bad smell like the one I used to have. So the material is more safe for me.
